TextLibrary.Text: I see you bring MRI with you. You have come to kill me then, like you did my people?
I see you bring MRI with you. You have come to kill me then, like you did my people?
No, my friends are not like the MRI you have met before. We come in peace. My name is Elgara.
No, my friends are not like the MRI you have met before. We come in peace. My name is Elgara.
My name is Psylt. Why are you here if you're not hunting us? The MRI have placed a good bounty on our heads.
My name is Psylt. Why are you here if you're not hunting us? The MRI have placed a good bounty on our heads.
We are here to offer assistance if you need it.
We are here to offer assistance if you need it.
Hrmph! I do not believe you.
Hrmph! I do not believe you.
Shoot down some of the MRI ships that patrol this system. I'll believe you then.
Shoot down some of the MRI ships that patrol this system. I'll believe you then.
